mdRecord.dcterms:title: Vintage Walking Wheel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A standup or walking spinning wheel. This wheel was originally owned and used by Ardella Turner Howery Slusher and passed to Marie Althea Howery Dickerson. Marie Dickerson was born in Floyd, Virginia and was a Floyd County School, second grade teacher for decades. Later the spinning wheel was passed on to Benitz Dickerson Lackey and then to the donor, Mr. Jeffery M. Lackey.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Spinning
Spinning-wheel
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
